body_html:
Hi I am using Anaconda3 4.4.0 64-bit, Windows 7, Python 3.6.1.
I just installed tensorflow successfully with the command
conda install tensorflow
Seems like the issue is resolved. So no need of creating new conda environment and installing the 3.5 version of python there and activating that environment.

body:
Hi I am using Anaconda3 4.4.0 64-bit, Windows 7, Python 3.6.1.
I just installed tensorflow successfully with the command
 `conda install tensorflow`
Seems like the issue is resolved. So no need of creating new conda environment and installing the 3.5 version of python there and activating that environment.
